message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer still gives you a good share.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the money's value will drop if we keep going.
The value is dropping fast, Bob. Let's settle this now. My turn to get a slightly better share.
I'm willing to take a bigger risk, the next offer will be worth even less. Let's end this.
Bob, we're losing serious money. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
